Thaumaturgy 7

Divine Name
Ritual
S5
spell id [id]: 1035
effect number [effect_number]: 39
damage [damage]: 1
spec [spec]: 8388608
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 25S
Gift of Reason:1
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster inscribes a divine name on a piece of paper and places it in the head of a mindless being. The being is gifted with an artificial mind and commanding abilities. The caster can also inscribe the name on the forehead of a willing target, increasing his mental faculties and making him a commander.
